THE PARSEC SUPERVISOR PICKED UP THECONDUCTOR AND THEY BOTH PROCEEDED TO THE DERAILMENT SITE.  THE TEENAGE PERSON CONTINUED TO THE LOCOMOTIVES AND INFORMED THE ENGINEER THAT HE OBSERVED SOME KIDS THROW A SWITCH UNDER THE TRAIN.  THE SITE INSPECTION REVEALED THAT THE 34TH CAR FROM THE LOCOMOTIVES, CAR TTAX 653802, HAD WHEELS R&L-5&6,R&L-3&4 AND R&L-1&2 DERAILED TO THE FIELD SIDE OF THE SOUTH RAIL OF THE SOUTH FIELD LEAD.
